com.mysampleapp.fileprovider
com.amazonaws.mobile.downloader-com.amazon.mysampleapp
Home Item Detail Item List @string/app_name Sign-in SIGN IN SIGN OUT \u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020 No Content Viewer No Viewing App exists for content type \'%s\'. Activity for the liked list
Overview Sample App Features User Sign-in Let your users sign in with public identity providers or your own identity system. Whether your users sign in or not, the User sign-in feature configures Amazon Cognito to uniquely identify the user and provide your app the appropriate credentials to access your AWS resources. The Sample App demonstrates assignment of a unique identifier for the user, the Amazon Cognito User ID. If optional or mandatory User Sign-in has been enabled in your project, then the Sample App also includes a sign-in screen, with a button for each configured sign-in provider. Powered by Amazon Cognito Demo User Identity App Analytics Collect app usage information and analyze key metrics. Amazon Mobile Analytics allows you to collect, visualize, and export app event data. You can track app usage and monetization in the Amazon Mobile Analytics console, or run custom analysis by automatically exporting app events to Amazon S3 and Amazon Redshift. The Sample App records user session activity in metrics that may be viewed in the Amazon Mobile Analytics console. It also provides buttons to demonstrate generating a custom or monetization event, which records user activity, such as the sale of an in-app purchase item. Powered by Amazon Mobile Analytics Demo App Analytics App Content Delivery Store and distribute media assets and other files. Store app assets like resource files in the cloud. Download and cache files in your app. The Sample App demonstrates file download and caching by providing a remote file explorer. You can download files from Amazon S3 (and optionally Amazon CloudFront) and pin them to the cache on device by clicking on each file entry. From the menu, you can download all recent files, set the cache size limit, or clear the cache. Powered by Amazon S3 and Amazon CloudFront Demo Content Delivery Cloud Logic Run backend code in the cloud. Run backend code in the cloud. The Sample App demonstrates the ability of a mobile app to invoke an AWS Lambda function. Enter the name of the function you wish to run and provide a list of request inputs. Invoke the function and see results. Powered by AWS Lambda Demo Cloud Logic User Identity User Identity Keep track of users Displays the user identity. Guest User USER IDENTIFIER User\'s name User\'s unique identifier <UNKNOWN IDENTITY> DISMISS Failed Identity Retrieval Could not retrieve the user identity:\u0020 App Analytics App Analytics Understand customer usage Note that events are batch processed and may take up to 60 minutes to display in the console. Generate Custom Event Generate Monetization Event Content Delivery Content Delivery Store app assets like resource files in the cloud. Cloud Logic Cloud Logic Deploy app logic to the cloud. FUNCTION REQUEST RESULT RESET INVOKE Error Dismiss No

Get Item Find Item with %1$s = \'%2$s\'.
Get Item Find Item with %1$s = \'%2$s\' and %3$s = \'%4$s\'.
Query by Partition Key and Sort Condition Find all items with %1$s = \'%2$s\' and %3$s < \'%4$s\'.
Query by Partition Key Find all items with %1$s = \'%2$s\'.
Query by Partition Key and Filter Find all items with %1$s = \'%2$s\' and %3$s > \'%4$s\'.
Query by Partition Key, Sort Condition, and Filter Find all items with %1$s = \'%2$s\', %3$s < \'%4$s\', and %5$s > \'%6$s\'.
Query by Partition Key and Sort Condition Find all items with %1$s = \'%2$s\' and %3$s > \'%4$s\'.
Query by Partition Key Find all items with %1$s = \'%2$s\'.
Query by Partition Key and Filter Find all items with %1$s = \'%2$s\' and %3$s > \'%4$s\'.
Query by Partition Key, Sort Condition, and Filter Find all items with %1$s = \'%2$s\', %3$s < \'%4$s\', and %5$s > \'%6$s\'.
Scan with Filter Find all items with \'%1$s\' > \'%2$s\'. Find all items with \'%1$s\' beginning with \'%2$s\' and \'%3$s\' beginning with \'%4$s\'. Find all items with \'%1$s\' beginning with \'%2$s\'
